about_the_game:
Race The Sun original soundtrack, composed by Forest San Filippo.
Includes 6 tracks. MP3 and FLAC files included.

  • 1moretime (3:29)
  • 2late (2:02)
  • 3eeeee (2:34)
  • 4ever (2:46)
  • Apocalyp5e (1:52)
  • Bonus track: Sunrise - from Sunrise DLC. (2:56)
